definition: to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: He who disobeys will be punished with six strokes of the whip.
sentences.chinese: 任何違令的船員將被打六鞭子。

sentences.english: Any sailor who disobeys will be punished with six strokes of the whip.
sentences.chinese: 任何違令的船員將被打六鞭子。

sentences.english: After 12 hours, they threw the rule away.
